channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2023111222
item.description:
Report X-2023111222

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: MABELVALE
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was crushed causing the lid on the bottle to loosen leading to leakage. DescribePack: Bottle was crushed and lid got loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was placed in a hazmat bag and given to QA

item.title: Report E-2023110507
item.description:
Report E-2023110507

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-22
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal LLR experienced a NA1760 Aluma-Brite HD release from a 55-gallon poly drum. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup and containment. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 20-gallons of material released to a 5’ x 5’ and 10’ x 3’ areas of the trailer floor and a 10’ x 3’ area of the concrete dock floor due to a forklift puncture. Absorbents were deployed and worked into the impacted areas and then collected into a 55-gallon poly drum. The damaged drum was placed into a 95-gallon poly overpack. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2023110489
item.description:
Report X-2023110489

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVRED ON THE TRAILER ON ITS SIDE. IT APPEARED TO HAVE BEEN DROPPED. PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG AND DRUM. DescribePack: LID BECAME LOOSE AFTER OUTER BOX WAS CRUSHED. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: LID TIGHTENED AND PACKAGE PLACED SECURELY IN DRUM.
